location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of Gwadur and Surrounding Area

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; black ink and pencil on paper.Dimensions: 200 x 252mm.

mods.abstract: This sketch map depicts Muscat-controlled Gwadur [Gwadar] and the surrounding area, with additional notes below. Marked in pencil are the routes of two roads leading from Gwadur to Pasni and Turbat respectively. Also depicted is the boundary between Gwadur and the state of Kalat. Scale not given.
